Passive Effect: ASPD +10; Active Effect: Marks the target and makes them easier to be targeted by allies. The mark explodes after 5 seconds, dealing 200% Arts damage to nearby enemies. Every hit on the marked target by allies increases the explosion damage by 5% of Lee's ATK (increases up to 20 times, and prematurely explodes if the limit is reached or the target is defeated)

Expands Attack Range, ATK and DEF +25%; Besides the current target, all enemies within range are pushed away slightly every time Lee attacks. Increases the likelihood of being targeted by enemy attacks and gains a 50% chance to dodge Physical or Arts attacks coming from outside his Attack Range
Unlimited duration

elite_levels.description: When Lee is blocking an enemy, the enemy has ASPD -7 and Lee has ASPD +7; If there is only one enemy within the surrounding 8 tiles, this effect is doubled
When Lee is blocking an enemy, the enemy has ASPD -14 and Lee has ASPD +14; If there is only one enemy within the surrounding 8 tiles, this effect is doubled

potential_upgrades.description: When Lee is blocking an enemy, the enemy has ASPD -8 (+1) and Lee has ASPD +8 (+1); If there is only one enemy within the surrounding 8 tiles, this effect is doubled
When Lee is blocking an enemy, the enemy has ASPD -15 (+1) and Lee has ASPD +15 (+1); If there is only one enemy within the surrounding 8 tiles, this effect is doubled

elite_levels.description: When DP is consumed by Lee's Trait, if there is sufficient DP, consumes 5 DP instead to block the next Stun/Frozen effect inflicted on Lee and Stun the attacker for 3 seconds
